short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights words or symbols in the Sonix webapp transcript based on a user-configurable list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transcript reviewers create lists of words to be highlighted in the Sonix transcript review webpage. Useful for bringing high-risk words to the attention of reviewers.
